name: gateway-service
description: This is a sample template for gateway-service - Below is a brief explanation of what we have generated for you:

scripts.try-build-gateway: cd gateway && go build && rm gateway
scripts.try-build-cors: cd cors && go build && rm cors
scripts.build: (npm run symlink) && (npm run gen) && (npm run try-build-all) && (sam build)
scripts.start: npm run build && sam local start-api -p 6000 --warm-containers eager --env-vars ./devenv.json
scripts.watch: nodemon -e go,graphql,yaml -i __generated__/ --signal SIGINT -x 'npm run start || exit 1'
